title: How Can I Create a Figma Variables Specifications Sheet
content: How can I create a Figma Variables specifications sheet? - The Design System Guide Close Figma # How can I create a Figma Variables specifications sheet? Romina Kavcic Use the plugin Print Variables, [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1310832673817237972/print-variables] if you want to automatically create a list of all the variables you are using in your Figma file/library. Next question How to import Figma Variables from styles with a plugin? Published on: Aug 27, 2024 Updated: Updated: Aug 27, 2024 ## Latest additions Glossary I need checklists for creating new Figma components Top 15 Design Systems in 2024 Design system podcasts Design systems using Web Components I'm Romina Kavcic. I coach design teams on implementing design systems, optimizing design processes, and developing design strategy. I'm Romina Kavcic. I coach design teams on implementing design systems, optimizing design processes, and developing design strategy.
